long_description: The power-packed Nikon Compact Zoom 8-24 x 25 binoculars feature a broad zoom power range and multicoated optics. Multicoated lenses provide bright image and glare reduction; BaK4 high-index Porro prisms provide a clear, crisp image. Quick central focusing with clicking diopter control fine-tunes each eyepiece for strain-free viewing. The Nikon Compact Zoom 8-24 x 25 binoculars feature eye relief of 13mm to accommodate the use of eyeglasses.
short_description: The power-packed Nikon Compact Zoom 8-24 x 25 binoculars feature a broad zoom power range and multicoated optics.
